name: Education
description: The Department of Education, Jadavpur University, housed in the new and accommodating Nazrul Bhavan of the Jadavpur University main campus, is engaged in implementing a conscious and positive change in the process of education and learning. It offers graduate, post-graduate, and doctorate level degrees in the field of Education to help students emerge as knowledgeable, efficient, and successful teachers at both the secondary and tertiary levels of academia.
